title: Gamification-Based Mathematics Learning and Physical Activity Promotion Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of instructional design, gamification theory, and mathematics education methodologies
context.additional_context: Workshop environment using digital devices, emphasizing collaboration among participants

learning_goals: Learners can develop strategies to motivate mathematics learning by applying gamification design principles.
Learners can create a project prototype combining physical activity and mathematics learning through workshop-based collaboration.
Learners can verify the effectiveness of gamification solutions using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
